title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.3 - Purchase price
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.3 - Purchase price

State Regulations

The insurer shall submit a certified statement, with supporting data, from the aircraft dealer or broker, affirming that the purchase price is in keeping with cost scales prevailing at the time of acquisition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
85.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
